price: Bazaba bongorerana hagati yabo bagira bati “Ku isi mwahamaze (iminsi) icumi gusa.”
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
